document_data.caption: Cover of ''The Forgotten Realms Atlas''.
document_data.title: The Forgotten Realms Atlas
document_data.author: [[Karen Wynn Fonstad]]
document_data.realm year: [[1358 DR]]<ref group="note">Based on the cited works, such as ''[[The Avatar Trilogy]]'' and ''[[The Wyvern's Spur]]''.
document_data.edition1: <!-- leave blank if there is only one -->
document_data.released1: August 1990<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.dmsguild.com/product/120837/The-Forgotten-Realms-Atlas-%282e%29|title=The Forgotten Realms Atlas (2e)|author=Shannon Appelcline|accessdate=2013-11-20|publisher=Dungeon Masters Guild}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Forgotten Realms Atlas''''' is a 2{{nd}}-edition ''Advanced Dungeons & Dragons'' accessory for the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]''.

{{Quote|''[[Abeir-Toril|TORIL]]... Visit the exciting and fantastic world of the Forgotten Realms.''

''Join adventurers renowned as they trek across Toril in this detailed, beautifully illustrated atlas. Ride with the [[Ffolk]] in the magical [[Moonshae Isles]]. Brave the brutal elements of [[Icewind Dale]]. Follow the gods as they wreak destruction from the [[Dalelands|Dales]] to [[Waterdeep]]. Watch as empires of East and West collide.'' 

''[[Karen Wynn Fonstad]], author of ''The Atlas of the Dragonlance<sup>®</sup> World'', ''The Atlas of Middle Earth'', ''The Atlas of Pern'', and ''The Atlas of the Land'', now brings you the spectacular and dynamic settings of the Forgotten Realms.''}}
document_data.Description: ''The Forgotten Realms Atlas'' was produced by [[Karen Wynn Fonstad]] and provides detailed maps of the [[Forgotten Realms]], as well as timelines of various novels set in the world.
document_data.Contents:
* Introduction
* Part One: Regions
* Part Two: The Moonshae Isles
* Part Three: The North and West
* Part Four: The Western Heartlands
* End Notes
* References
* Index
